# Run tests

This markdown can be used to run unit tests.
Recommendations for code testing can be found in [this chapter](https://docs.b-cubed.eu/dev-guide/r/#testing) of the B-Cubed documentation website.
We check for any failed tests.

```{r}
tryCatch(test_dir(here("tests", "testthat"), reporter = "Check"),
         error = function(e) cli::cli_warn(e))
```
